name: AKTIVE GALLERY DEMO VR
description:
Gigoia Studios presents a  VIRTUAL REALITY exhibition, a collection of digital art from  designer and artist Carlos Monteiro (CEO and founder). *IF YOU ARE AN ARTIST AND IS INTERESTED TO HAVE YOUR OWN CUSTOM VIRTUAL ART GALLERY, PLEASE VISIT  OUR PAGE

TO INSTALL THE APK FILE  on Meta Quest:

Meta Quest  : You can install the .APK via sideloading. For most people, the easiest way to do this is to install via SideQuest. After configuring your  Meta Quest  for developer mode, and installing/setting up Sidequest on your desktop, you can then just drag and drop the APK into SideQuest in the area in the top left corner.

Also, you can install Meta Software on your computer to control / install APKs.
https://developer.oculus.com/downloads/package/oculus-developer-hub-win/

Launch  AKTIVE GALLERY DEMO  on the Meta Quest  by navigating to the Library, selecting the Unknown Sources category, look for "AKTIVE GALLERY DEMO " and run it.

You can watch  a great tutorial video by Virtual Reality Oasis and Cas and Chary VR

* The use of games belonging to Gigoia Studios are for the buyer's personal use only and can not be marketed, altered, resold, used for other purposes without prior authorization from Gigoia Studios.
